title: Ep 460 | Jase Admires the Masters Caddies & Phil Calls God a Friend
description:
Jase shares a story about the 2022 Masters Golf Tournament, and Phil jokes about faith. Al and Phil discuss fear and its place inside a friendship with God, and Jase explains the difference between God knowing your heart and theologically correct behavior. Al discusses Abraham being called God's friend, and Jase takes a look at how everyone can see pride from afar, except the prideful.
